alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Eastern Lincoln County; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; South Central Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 12 at 10:26AM MDT until October 12 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West to northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Sangre de Cristo Mountains, South Central Mountains, Eastern Lincoln County, and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust may reduce visibility below 5 miles at times.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Eastern Lincoln County; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; South Central Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southwest Chaves County
